name: SONIC CYAN HEXAGON
description:
Explore a trippy polygon 3D world. Fly across ocean and alien rock formations.

Collect colored rotating hexagons to alter the landscape. Go underwater to discover visual effects.

Headphones are highly recommended for sensorial experience. Music was carefully crafted with many layers of textures, synth FX and soft reverbs.

Have fun :)

FOLLOW US LIVE at TWITCH.TV:  https://www.twitch.tv/starpalmgames

Follow us on Twitter:  @starpalmgames

Minimum hardware  requirements:
Processor: 1,4 GHz Intel Core i5
Memory: 8 GB 1600 MHz DDR3
Graphics:  Intel HD Graphics 5000 1536 MB or better
